name: Revavroom
description: The Multi-Cyl Pokémon. It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders—now numbering eight—to generate energy.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.description: When hit by a move type this Pokémon is vulnerable to, it may roll a d4. In a result of 4, it does not take the additional damage.
